text: Pope Anterus (died January 3, 236) was the nineteenth Pope, (the official title is the Bishop of Rome) of the Catholic Church. He served less than two months and died a natural death. He was buried in the cemetery of Callistus on the Appian Way.Catholic Encyclopedia, (NY:Robert Appleton Company) He is considered a Saint by the Catholic Church and his feast day is celebrated of January.Richard P. McBrien, Lives of the Popes: The Pontiffs from St. Peter to John Paul II, (San Francisco:Harper San Francisco, 1997), p. 46 == References == Category:Italian popes Category:236 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Pope Anterus
